name: Adam Sandler
summary: Adam Sandler. Actor: The Waterboy. Adam Richard Sandler was born September 9, 1966 in Brooklyn, New York, to Judith (Levine), a teacher at a nursery school, and Stanley Alan Sandler, an electrical engineer. He is of Russian Jewish descent. At 17, he took his first step towards becoming a stand-up comedian when he spontaneously took the stage at a Boston comedy club. He found he was a natural comic. He...
awards: Nominated for 5 Primetime Emmys | 72 wins & 132 nominations total
